page.title: 12THE RURAL DOCTOR 2
page.content:
HE WORKS WITH 4 OR 5 OTHER DOCTORS WHO COVER HIS WORK WHEN HE IS AWAY. HE GETS 1 OR 2 WEEKS FOR A HOLIDAY.
A DOCTOR HAS TO GET 3 A LEVELS.THEY ARE BIOLOGY,CHEMISTRY AND PHYSICS.WHEN HE LEFT SCHOOL HE WAS LUCKY AND GOT TWO YEARS IN MEDICAL SCHOOL.AFTER THAT HE HAD THREE AS HOUSEMAN IN A HOSPITAL. THE DOCTOR WORKED AS AN ARMY DOCTOR FOR SIX YEARS.AFTER THAT HE CAME TO{ATTLEBOROUGH SURGERY.
THE MAIN BAD DISEASES ARE STROKES,HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE AND HEART DISEASE.
THE DOCTOR'S HOBBIES ARE FISHING COLLECTING BOOKS BY DIFFERENT AUTHORS AND STAMPS.
